comment.author: 78031380@N07
comment._content: The Lady on the far left is Joanne Hester , Jims wife and next to her is Norma Poland a neighbor when the Hesters lived in Brentwood California. The Lady on the far right is Mary who's last name I do not remember!

comment.author: 78031380@N07
comment._content: The name of the ranch was "The Big Oak Basin" and was located in the Malibu Mountains between Latigo Canyon road and Mulhulland road.
